meanings.sent1: She decided to retinting her hair for a brighter color.
meanings.sent2: The painter will retinting the walls to match the new furniture.
meanings.sent3: After the mishap, he had to retinting the car, turning it into a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush danced on the canvas, retinting the world with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly retinting the sky with shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The act of adding color to something again.
meanings.sent1: The retinting of the old photograph brought back memories of the past.
meanings.sent2: She specialized in the retinting of faded photographs, making them look new.
meanings.sent3: The retinting of the house made it look like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent4: His retinting of the garden transformed it into a vibrant paradise.
meanings.sent5: The retinting of the sky at sunset painted a breathtaking scene.
